## sortedKeys() function

Syntax sugar for `Object.keys(x).sort()` with support for custom comparator (default: [compare](./compare.compare.md)<!-- -->) and yielding iterator of sorted keys.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function sortedKeys(x: any, cmp?: Comparator<string>): Generator<string, void, undefined>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  x | <code>any</code> |  |
|  cmp | <code>Comparator&lt;string&gt;</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Generator<string, void, undefined>`
